expo.name: lemon-wedges-app
expo.description:
Explore a fascinating world of bartending in a new way.
Learn what ingredients you need and how to mix your favorite manhattans, 
sours, mojitos, and thousands of other cocktails.
Mobile app to explore these recipes and also submit your own and share them with your friends.

Expo ProjectLink: https://expo.io/@binaryfetch/projects/lemon-wedges-app
